== Web Page Project Overview ==
This page was created to encourage participation by allowing anyone to quickly view the project status and outstanding tasks.  At this point in time feel free to add ideas, tasks or anything else you think may be useful.

If we incorporate as many ideas as possible, I think we'll all have a better chance of making something we are all excited to be a part of.

=== Problem Statement ===
The PNWTeam needs a homepage that will generate excitement about the teamsâ€™ activities and spread the spirit of Ubuntu.

=== Mission ===
Give the PNWTeam a face to show the world by making a homepage with a great look and feel.

=== Objectives ===
* Provides a user friendly look and feel 
* Generate a method for users to request and track support from team members
* Include information such as scheduled meetings and events

== Project Scope ==
* Main page
** Team calendar
** Team events
** General team information

* Support (<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/PNWTeam-UserSupport|Associated Project Details]]</nowiki>)
** User help request form
** User confirmation / tracking method
** Team member update / collaboration

* Team forum
** Message Board / Forum for team to keep on going discussions about projects, concerns and events

* Team Project Board
** Devise some method or process to track current project status' by listing project information as well as the teams plan of attack and a task / owner / estimated delivery date
